attributes.action: Make all petitions non electronic aswell
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make all petitions non electronic aswell, because it is discriminating against people who: dont have a personal computer, or access to one or a personal email account.

rejection.details: You are free to conduct a paper-based petition. Please email "team@petitions.pm.gov.uk" with your concerns.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
